mapper.sql: SELECT sc.id as id, sc.time_slot, sc.day_of_week, c.id as course_id, s.id as subject_id, s.name as subject_name, t.id as teacher_id, t.first_name as teacher_first_name, t.last_name as teacher_last_name, r.id as room_id, r.building as room_building, r.floor as room_floor, r.room_number as room_room_number, g.id as group_id, st.id as student_id, st.first_name as student_first_name, st.last_name as student_last_name FROM schedules sc LEFT JOIN courses c on sc.course_id=c.id LEFT JOIN subjects s on c.subject_id=s.id LEFT JOIN teachers t on c.teacher_id=t.id LEFT JOIN rooms r on c.room_id=r.id LEFT JOIN student_groups g on c.group_id=g.id LEFT JOIN students st on g.id=st.group_id
